message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better value elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. I could come down to $18,000, but I can't go any lower than that.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing the product. I would like to propose a price of $16,000.
